metadata.name: Luxx Pass +
metadata.description: Congratulations, you just minted a Luxx Pass + and are on your way to all the perks of membership. Once all 777 passes mint, they will go through a genesis update. This update will reveal the membership tier, unlock all metadata, reveal your Cryptolex watch and membership card mint as well as provide all the necessary links to take advantage of the perks of Luxx Pass + ownership. For more infor visit: https://cryptolex-nft.io
